name: Spectral Speeders
description:
Spectral Speeders™

Story

You passed out after a new brain expirement:

Getting your brain in a videogame.

It has succeeded, but there is one problem now, you need to get out.

Gameplay

Run, Vault, Jump and Glide as fast as possible to the end of the level as fast as possible. There are 6 levels thus far.
